abstract: Mikaela Shiffrin wins slalom in Maribor, Slovenia, for her 12th World Cup win in category; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mikaela Shiffrin comfortably earned her 12th career World Cup slalom victory on Sunday, skiing through pouring rain in Maribor, Slovenia.
snippet: Mikaela Shiffrin comfortably earned her 12th career World Cup slalom victory on Sunday, skiing through pouring rain in Maribor, Slovenia.
